about.drafts_description_long: Drafts is a platform that provides high-quality design and software development services to its clients. We work tirelessly to develop your projects and offer solutions tailored to your needs. At Drafts, we prioritize long-term collaborations and are committed to delivering innovative services that help our clients achieve their goals. Our mission is to ensure the success of your business by providing top-notch services.
about.drafts_description_short: Drafts offers high-quality design and software development services, tailored to your needs. We focus on long-term partnerships, delivering innovative solutions to help your business succeed.

our_work.work_slider_static_title: Take a look at our projects
our_work.slider_static_text: We provide design and programming services tailored to every individual need.
our_work.slider_error_message: Your browser does not support the video tag.

services_headline.title: Services
services_headline.first_headline: How we take your business to the next level
services_headline.second_headline: We are an agency distinguished by our professionalism, and we are committed to helping you take your business to the next level.

services_accordion.title: Graphic Design
services_accordion.content: Creative and user-centric designs ensure your projects stand out and leave a lasting impression. Our experienced graphic designers provide unique and functional solutions tailored to your needs.

services_accordion.title: UX/UI Design
services_accordion.content: User-centric design plays a key role in providing a unique user experience. Our UX/UI designers do their magic to provide a unique and cost-effective web and mobile presence.

services_accordion.title: Front-end Developer
services_accordion.content: Our professional frontend developer team works together to create high-quality, functional, visually appealing, and high-performing websites.

services_accordion.title: Back-end Developer
services_accordion.content: By building robust systems and providing reliable solutions with modern technologies, our team of professional backend developers ensures that websites run smoothly and perform at a high level.

headline.title: Faq
headline.content: Can't find what you're looking for? We're here to help. Contact us with any other questions!

faq_accordion.title: Why should we choose Drafts over other web design agencies?
faq_accordion.firstContent: Why should we choose Drafts over other web design agencies?
faq_accordion.secondContent: Our skilled team Graphic Design as well as UX/UI designers, frontend, and backend developers work together to deliver high-quality, functional, and visually stunning websites that perform exceptionally.

faq_accordion.title: Will I get access to the source code if I use your service?
faq_accordion.firstContent: Yes, at Drafts, we believe in transparency and client ownership. When you use our services for website design or development, you will have full access to the source code upon project completion. Here's how it works:
faq_accordion.secondContent:
Yes, at Drafts, we believe in transparency and client ownership. When you use our services for website design or development, you will have full access to the source code upon project completion. Here's how it works:

1. Full Ownership
2. Custom Code Delivery
3. Third-Party Tools and Licenses
4. Long-Term Support

faq_accordion.title: How do you ensure that the website reflects our brand identity?
faq_accordion.secondContent:
At Drafts, we take a meticulous and collaborative approach to ensure your website accurately reflects your brand identity. Here’s how we achieve this:

1. In-Depth Brand Analysis
2. Collaborative Strategy Sessions
3. Custom Design Elements
4. Consistency Across the Website
5. User-Centric Approach
6. Testing and Refinement

faq_accordion.title: What kind of businesses do you usually work with?
faq_accordion.secondContent:
At Drafts, we collaborate with a diverse range of businesses across various industries, tailoring our services to meet the unique needs of each client. Some of the types of businesses we typically work with include:

1. Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises (SMEs)
2. Startups, Corporations and Enterprises
3. E-Commerce Businesses
4. Creative Agencies
5. Nonprofits and Educational Institutions
6. Health and Wellness
7. Consulting and Professional Services
8. Tech Companies

faq_accordion.title: How do you measure the success of a website after launch?
faq_accordion.secondContent:
At Drafts, we understand that a website's success is measured by its performance in achieving both business and user goals. Here are the key metrics and methods we use to assess a website’s success after launch:

1. User Engagement Metrics
2. Conversion Rates
3. Traffic and SEO Performance
4. Load Times and Technical Performance
5. Feedback and User Testing

footer.title: Our Work
footer.headline: We will clarify your needs and prepare a project plan for you with an estimated cost and timeline

planner.content_desktop: For general questions, please complete the form to reach us. If you already have project specifics, visit our project planner for a detailed step-by-step approach.
planner.content_mobile: For general inquiries, fill out the form. If you have project details, visit our project planner for a step-by-step guide.

form.name: name
form.content: By submiting this form I accept the Privacy Policy of this site.

sections.title: OUR MISSION
sections.content: We delve deep into research, putting users at the heart of our design process. By testing with real customers, we craft digital interfaces and experiences that are not just well-informed but also resonate with authenticity. Our aim? To enrich lives and revolutionize businesses through innovation and empathy.

sections.title: OUR VISION
sections.content: We're on a mission to make millions smile by crafting Visual identities and digital interfaces with purpose for the world's leading brands. With every click and swipe, we're weaving experiences that not only elevate lives but also redefine digital engagement. Join us in shaping a brighter, more connected future, one pixel at a time.

sections.title: AUTHENTIC
sections.content: In every interaction and solution, we etch the imprint of authenticity, a testament to our dedication to fostering accurate connections. Our ethos? To weave sincerity into every pixel, building bridges that stand the test of time and nurture lasting relationships.
